item.title: Getting Started with Regression: An Introductory Guide (Part 1)
item.author: Han
item.description: An Introductory Guide (Part 1) Even with the rapid advancements in deep learning, regression continues to be widely used across various fields (e.g., finance, data science, statistics, and so on), maintaining its importance as a fundamental algorithm. That’s why I’ve decided to share this post, which is the first article in a dedicated series on regression. This series is designed to provide a thorough review while offering a gentle and accessible introduction.
